trans-unit.source: about_Job_Details
trans-unit.target: about_Job_Details

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About Job Details
trans-unit.target: 有关作业的详细信息

trans-unit.source: about_Job_Details
trans-unit.target: about_Job_Details

trans-unit.source: about_Job_Details
trans-unit.target: about_Job_Details

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: Provides details about background jobs on local and remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 在本地和远程计算机上提供有关后台作业的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: DETAILED DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: This topic explains the concept of a background job and provides technical information about how background jobs work in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 本主题解释后台作业的概念，并提供有关在 Windows PowerShell 后台作业中如何工作的技术信息。

trans-unit.source: This topic is a supplement to the about_Jobs and about_Remote_Jobs topics.
trans-unit.target: 本主题是 about_Jobs 和 about_Remote_Jobs 主题的补充。

trans-unit.source: ABOUT BACKGROUND JOBS
trans-unit.target: 有关后台作业

trans-unit.source: A background job runs a command or expression asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 后台作业异步运行的命令或表达式。

trans-unit.source: It might run a cmdlet, a function, a script, or any other command-based task.
trans-unit.target: 它可能运行 cmdlet、 函数、 脚本或任何其他基于命令的任务。

trans-unit.source: It is designed to run commands that take an extended period of time, but you can use it to run any command in the background.
trans-unit.target: 而旨在运行需要的时间很长的时间的命令，但可以使用它来在后台运行任何命令。

trans-unit.source: When a synchronous command runs, the Windows PowerShell command prompt is suppressed until the command is complete.
trans-unit.target: 同步命令运行时，该命令完成之前取消 Windows PowerShell 命令提示符。

trans-unit.source: But a background job does not suppress the Windows PowerShell prompt.
trans-unit.target: 但是，后台作业不会取消的 Windows PowerShell 提示符。

trans-unit.source: A command to start a background job returns a job object.
trans-unit.target: 启动后台作业的命令返回作业对象。

trans-unit.source: The prompt returns immediately so you can work on other tasks while the background job runs.
trans-unit.target: 因此您可以处理其他任务在后台作业运行时立即返回至命令提示符。

trans-unit.source: However, when you start a background job, you do not get the results immediately even if the job runs very quickly.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当您启动后台作业，您未获得结果立即即使作业运行速度非常快。

trans-unit.source: The job object that is returned contains useful information about the job, but it does not contain the job results.
trans-unit.target: 返回的作业对象包含有关该作业的有用信息但不包含作业结果。

trans-unit.source: You must run a separate command to get the job results.
trans-unit.target: 您必须运行单独的命令来获取作业结果。

trans-unit.source: You can also run commands to stop the job, to wait for the job to be completed, and to delete the job.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以运行命令来停止作业，等待作业完成，以及删除该作业。

trans-unit.source: To make the timing of a background job independent of other commands, each background job runs in its own Windows PowerShell environment (a "session").
trans-unit.target: 若要使独立于其他命令的后台作业的时间，每个后台作业运行其自己的 Windows PowerShell 环境 （"会话"） 中。

trans-unit.source: However, this can be a temporary connection that is created only to run the job and is then destroyed, or it can be a persistent session (a PSSession) that you can use to run several related jobs or commands.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这可能是一个临时连接创建仅用于运行作业，然后销毁，也可以是一个持久性会话 (PSSession) 可用于运行多个相关作业或命令。

trans-unit.source: USING THE JOB CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: 使用 JOB CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Use a Start-Job command to start a background job on a local computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Start-job 命令在本地计算机上启动后台作业。

trans-unit.source: Start-Job returns a job object.
trans-unit.target: 启动作业返回作业对象。

trans-unit.source: You can also get objects representing the jobs that were started on the local computer by using the Get-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以获取表示使用 Get-job cmdlet 在本地计算机启动的作业的对象。

trans-unit.source: To get the job results, use a Receive-Job command.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取作业结果，请使用 Receive-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: If the job is not complete, Receive-Job returns partial results.
trans-unit.target: 如果未完成作业后，接收作业返回部分结果。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Wait-Job cmdlet to suppress the command prompt until one or all of the jobs that were started in the session are complete.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Wait-job cmdlet 来禁止显示命令提示符处，直到一个或多个会话中启动的作业都已完成。

trans-unit.source: To stop a background job, use the Stop-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止后台作业，请使用停止作业 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To delete a job, use the Remove-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除作业，请使用 Remove-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the cmdlets work, see the Help topic for each cmdlet, and see about_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 有关这些 cmdlet 的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅每个 cmdlet 的帮助主题，请参阅 about_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: STARTING BACKGROUND JOBS ON REMOTE COMPUTERS
trans-unit.target: 在远程计算机上启动后台作业

trans-unit.source: You can create and manage background jobs on a local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以创建和管理本地或远程计算机上的后台作业。

trans-unit.source: To run a background job remotely, use the AsJob parameter of a cmdlet such as Invoke-Command, or use the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a Start-Job command remotely.
trans-unit.target: 若要远程运行后台作业，请使用 Invoke-command，如 cmdlet 的 AsJob 参数或使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 远程运行 Start-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also start a background job in an interactive session.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以交互式会话中启动后台作业。

trans-unit.source: For more information about remote background jobs, see about_Remote_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 有关远程后台作业的详细信息，请参阅 about_Remote_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: CHILD JOBS
trans-unit.target: 子作业

trans-unit.source: Each background job consists of a parent job and one or more child jobs.
trans-unit.target: 每个后台作业包含父作业和一个或多个子作业。

trans-unit.source: In jobs started by using Start-Job or the AsJob parameter of Invoke-Command, the parent job is an executive.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Start-job 或 Invoke-command 的 AsJob 参数启动的作业，在父作业是一名经理。

trans-unit.source: It does not run any commands or return any results.
trans-unit.target: 它不运行任何命令或返回任何结果。

trans-unit.source: The commands are actually run by the child jobs.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令实际上由子作业运行。

trans-unit.source: (Jobs started by using other cmdlets might work differently.)
trans-unit.target: （通过使用其他 cmdlet 启动作业可能工作方式不同。）

trans-unit.source: The child jobs are stored in the ChildJobs property of the parent job object.
trans-unit.target: 子作业存储在父作业对象的 ChildJobs 属性。

trans-unit.source: The ChildJobs property can contain one or many child job objects.
trans-unit.target: ChildJobs 属性可以包含一个或多个子作业对象。

trans-unit.source: The child job objects have a name, ID, and instance ID that differ from the parent job so that you can manage the parent and child jobs individually or as a unit.
trans-unit.target: 子作业对象具有名称、 ID 和与父作业不同，以便你可以单独或作为一个单元管理的父和子作业的实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: To get the parent and child jobs of a job, use the IncludeChildJobs parameter of the Get-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取作业的父和子作业，请使用 Get-job cmdlet 的 IncludeChildJobs 参数。

trans-unit.source: The IncludeChildJob parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: IncludeChildJob 参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> Get-Job -IncludeChildJob
trans-unit.target: C:\PS > Get-job IncludeChildJob

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 1 Job1 RemoteJob Failed True localhost Get-Process 2 Job2 Completed True Server01 Get-Process 3 Job3 Failed False localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 1 Job1 RemoteJob 失败，则返回 True localhost Get-process 2 Job2 完成，则返回 True Server01 Get-process 3 Job3 失败 False localhost 获取进程

trans-unit.source: To get the parent job and only the child jobs with a particular State value, use the ChildJobState parameter of the Get-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取父作业和仅具有特定的状态值的子作业，请使用 Get-job cmdlet 的 ChildJobState 参数。

trans-unit.source: The ChildJobState parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: ChildJobState 参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> Get-Job -ChildJobState Failed
trans-unit.target: C:\PS > Get-job ChildJobState 失败

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 1 Job1 RemoteJob Failed True localhost Get-Process 3 Job3 Failed False localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 1 Job1 RemoteJob 失败，则返回 True localhost Get-process 3 Job3 失败 False localhost 获取进程

trans-unit.source: To get the child jobs of a job on all versions of Windows PowerShell, use the ChildJob property of the parent job.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取所有版本的 Windows PowerShell 上的子作业的作业，请使用父作业 ChildJob 属性。

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> (Get-Job Job1).ChildJobs
trans-unit.target: C:\PS > (Get-job Job1)。ChildJobs

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 2 Job2 Completed True Server01 Get-Process 3 Job3 Failed False localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 2 Job2 完成，则返回 True Server01 Get-process 3 Job3 失败 False localhost 获取进程

trans-unit.source: You can also use a Get-Job command on the child job, as shown in the following command:
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令中所示，还可以在子作业使用 Get-job 命令︰

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> Get-Job Job3
trans-unit.target: C:\PS > Get-job Job3

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 3 Job3 Failed False localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 3 Job3 失败 False localhost 获取进程

trans-unit.source: The configuration of the child job depends on the command that you use to start the job.
trans-unit.target: 子作业的配置取决于你用于启动该作业的命令。

trans-unit.source: -- When you use Start-Job to start a job on a local computer, the job consists of an executive parent job and a child job that runs the command.
trans-unit.target: --当使用启动作业在本地计算机上启动作业，作业 executive 父作业和包含运行该命令的子作业。

trans-unit.source: -- When you use the AsJob parameter of Invoke-Command to start a job on one or more computers, the job consists of an executive parent job and a child job for each job run on each computer.
trans-unit.target: --当使用 Invoke-command 的 AsJob 参数在一个或多台计算机上启动作业，作业 executive 父作业和包含每个作业每台计算机上运行的子作业。

trans-unit.source: -- When you use Invoke-Command to run a Start-Job command on one or more remote computers, the result is the same as a local command run on each remote computer.
trans-unit.target: --当使用 Invoke-command 运行 Start-job 命令在一个或多个远程计算机上，则结果是在每台远程计算机上运行的本地命令相同。

trans-unit.source: The command returns a job object for each computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令返回作业对象的每台计算机。

trans-unit.source: The job object consists of an executive parent job and one child job that runs the command.
trans-unit.target: 作业对象组成的 executive 父作业和运行该命令的一个子作业。

trans-unit.source: The parent job represents all of the child jobs.
trans-unit.target: 父作业表示所有子作业。

trans-unit.source: When you manage a parent job, you also manage the associated child jobs.
trans-unit.target: 当你管理父作业时，还可以管理关联的子作业。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you stop a parent job, all child jobs are stopped.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您停止父作业，将停止所有子作业。

trans-unit.source: If you get the results of a parent job, you get the results of all child jobs.
trans-unit.target: 获取父作业的结果，如果您获得的所有子作业的结果。

trans-unit.source: However, you can also manage child jobs individually.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以单独管理子作业。

trans-unit.source: This is most useful when you want to investigate a problem with a job or get the results of only one of a number of child jobs started by using the AsJob parameter of Invoke-Command.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要调查作业问题或获取的结果数量的子作业通过使用 Invoke-command 的 AsJob 参数启动之一时，这是最有用。

trans-unit.source: (The backtick character [`] is the continuation character.)
trans-unit.target: （反撇号字符 ['] 是继续符。）

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the AsJob parameter of Invoke-Command to start background jobs on the local computer and two remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令使用 Invoke-command 的 AsJob 参数在本地计算机和两台远程计算机上启动后台作业。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the job in the $j variable.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将作业保存在 $j 变量。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> $j = Invoke-Command -ComputerName localhost, Server01, Server02 ` -Command {Get-Date} -AsJob
trans-unit.target: PS c: > $j = Invoke-command-ComputerName localhost，Server01、 Server02 的命令 {Get-date} AsJob

trans-unit.source: When you display the Name and ChildJob properties of the job in $j, it shows that the command returned a job object with three child jobs, one for each computer.
trans-unit.target: 当在 $j 中显示该作业的名称和 ChildJob 属性时，它显示该命令返回了具有三个子作业，每台计算机的作业对象。

trans-unit.source: CPS C:> $j | Format-List Name, ChildJobs
trans-unit.target: CPS c: > $j |Format-list Name ChildJobs

trans-unit.source: Name : Job3 ChildJobs : {Job4, Job5, Job6}
trans-unit.target: 名称︰ Job3 ChildJobs: {Job4 Job5，Job6}

trans-unit.source: When you display the parent job, it shows that the job failed.
trans-unit.target: 当显示父作业时，它显示的作业失败。

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> $j
trans-unit.target: C:\PS > $j

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置

trans-unit.source: 3 Job3 RemotingJob Failed False localhost,Server...
trans-unit.target: 3 Job3 RemotingJob 失败 False localhost，而服务器...

trans-unit.source: But when you run a Get-Job command that gets the child jobs, the output shows that only one child job failed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，运行时获取的子作业的 Get-job 命令，该输出显示该只能有一个子作业失败。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Get-Job -IncludeChildJobs
trans-unit.target: PS c: > Get-job IncludeChildJobs

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 3 Job3 RemotingJob Failed False localhost,Server... 4 Job4 Completed True localhost Get-Date 5 Job5 Failed False Server01 Get-Date 6 Job6 Completed True Server02 Get-Date
trans-unit.target: 3 Job3 RemotingJob 失败 False localhost，而服务器...4 Job4 完成，则返回 True localhost Get-date 5 Job5 失败 False Server01 获取日期 6 Job6 完成，则返回 True Server02 Get-date

trans-unit.source: To get the results of all child jobs, use the Receive-Job cmdlet to get the results of the parent job.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的所有子作业的结果，请使用 Receive-job cmdlet 来获取父作业的结果。

trans-unit.source: But you can also get the results of a particular child job, as shown in the following command.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您还可以获取特定的子作业的结果，如下面的命令中所示。

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> Receive-Job -Name Job6 -Keep | Format-Table ComputerName, DateTime -Auto
trans-unit.target: C:\PS > 接收作业的名称 Job6-保留 |表格格式 ComputerName、 DateTime 的自动

trans-unit.source: ComputerName DateTime
trans-unit.target: 计算机名的日期时间

trans-unit.source: Server02 Thursday, March 13, 2008 4:16:03 PM
trans-unit.target: Server02 2008 年 3 月 13 日，星期四，4:16:03 PM

trans-unit.source: The child jobs feature of Windows PowerShell background jobs gives you more control over the jobs that you run.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 后台作业的子作业功能使您更好地控制你运行的作业。

trans-unit.source: JOB TYPES
trans-unit.target: 作业类型

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell supports different types of jobs for different tasks.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 支持为不同任务的不同类型的作业。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, developers can write "job source adapters" that add new job types to Windows PowerShell and include the job source adapters in modules.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，开发人员可以编写"作业源适配器"，将新的作业类型添加到 Windows PowerShell 模块中包括的作业源适配器。

trans-unit.source: When you import the module, you can use the new job type in your session.
trans-unit.target: 导入模块时，您可以在会话中使用新的作业类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the PSScheduledJob module adds scheduled jobs and the PSWorkflow module adds workflow jobs.
trans-unit.target: 例如，PSScheduledJob 模块添加计划的作业，PSWorkflow 模块添加的工作流作业。

trans-unit.source: Custom jobs types might differ significantly from standard Windows PowerShell background jobs.
trans-unit.target: 从标准 Windows PowerShell 后台作业，自定义作业类型的差异可能很大。

trans-unit.source: For example, scheduled jobs are saved on disk; they do not exist only in a particular session.
trans-unit.target: 例如，计划的作业将保存在磁盘上;仅在特定会话中不存在。

trans-unit.source: Workflow jobs can be suspended and resumed.
trans-unit.target: 可以挂起和恢复工作流作业。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that you use to manage custom jobs depend on the job type.
trans-unit.target: 用来管理自定义作业的 cmdlet 取决于作业类型。

trans-unit.source: For some, you use the standard job cmdlets, such as Get-Job and Start-Job.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些，您可以使用标准 job cmdlet，如 Get-job 和启动作业。

trans-unit.source: Others come with specialized cmdlets that manage only a particular type of job.
trans-unit.target: 其他人都附带有管理特定类型的作业的专用 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about custom job types, see the help topics about the job type.
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义作业类型的详细信息，请参阅作业类型有关的帮助主题。

trans-unit.source: To find the job type of a job, use the Get-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找作业的作业类型，请使用 Get-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Get-Job returns different job objects for different types of jobs.
trans-unit.target: Get-job 返回不同类型的作业的不同的作业对象。

trans-unit.source: The value of the PSJobTypeName property of the job objects that Get-Job returns indicates the job type.
trans-unit.target: Get-job 返回的作业对象 PSJobTypeName 属性的值指示的作业类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the job types that come with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了 Windows PowerShell 附带的作业类型。

trans-unit.source: Job Type Description
trans-unit.target: 作业类型说明

trans-unit.source: BackgroundJob Started by using the Start-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Start-job cmdlet 启动 BackgroundJob。

trans-unit.source: RemoteJob Started by using the AsJob parameter of the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 的 AsJob 参数启动 RemoteJob。

trans-unit.source: PSWorkflowJob Started by using the AsJob parameter of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用工作流的 AsJob 参数启动 PSWorkflowJob。

trans-unit.source: PSScheduledJob An instance of a scheduled job started by a job trigger.
trans-unit.target: PSScheduledJob 由作业触发器启动计划作业的实例。

trans-unit.source: CIMJob Started by using the AsJob parameter of a cmdlet from a CDXML module.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 CDXML 模块中的 cmdlet 的 AsJob 参数启动 CIMJob。

trans-unit.source: WMIJob Started by using the AsJob parameter of a cmdlet from a WMI module.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 WMI 模块中的 cmdlet 的 AsJob 参数启动 WMIJob。

trans-unit.source: PSEventJob Created by running Register-ObjectEvent and specifying an action with the Action parameter.
trans-unit.target: PSEventJob 创建通过运行 Register-objectevent 并使用 Action 参数指定的操作。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Before using the Get-Job cmdlet to get jobs of a particular type, verify that the module that adds the job type is imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 之前使用 Get-job cmdlet 来获取特定类型的作业，请验证添加的作业类型的模块导入到当前会话。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, Get-Job does not get jobs of that type.
trans-unit.target: 否则，Get 作业不会获取该类型的作业。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: The following commands create a local background job, a remote background job, a workflow job, and a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令将创建本地后台作业、 远程后台作业、 工作流作业和计划的作业。

trans-unit.source: Then, it uses the Get-Job cmdlet to get the jobs.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用 Get-job cmdlet 来获取的作业。

trans-unit.source: Get-Job does not get the scheduled job, but it gets any started instances of the scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 获取作业不会由于计划的作业，但它将获取任何已启动计划作业的实例。

trans-unit.source: Start a background job on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在本地计算机上启动后台作业。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Start-Job -Name LocalData {Get-Process}
trans-unit.target: PS c: > 开始作业-命名本地数据 {Get-process}

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 2 LocalData BackgroundJob Running True localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 2 的本地数据 BackgroundJob 运行，则返回 True localhost 获取进程

trans-unit.source: Start a background job that runs on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 启动远程计算机运行的后台作业。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Invoke-Command -ComputerName Server01 {Get-Process} -AsJob -JobName RemoteData
trans-unit.target: PS c: > Invoke-command-ComputerName Server01 {Get-process} AsJob-JobName RemoteData

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 2 RemoteData RemoteJob Running True Server01 Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 2 RemoteData RemoteJob 运行，则返回 True Server01 Get-process

trans-unit.source: Create a scheduled job PS C:> Register-ScheduledJob -Name ScheduledJob -ScriptBlock {Get-Process} ` -Trigger (New-JobTrigger -Once -At "3 PM")
trans-unit.target: 创建计划的作业 PS c: > Register-scheduledjob-名称 ScheduledJob-ScriptBlock {Get-process} ' 的触发器 (New-jobtrigger-一次-在"3 PM")

trans-unit.source: Id Name JobTriggers Command Enabled
trans-unit.target: 启用 id 名称 JobTriggers 命令

trans-unit.source: 1 ScheduledJob 1 Get-Process True
trans-unit.target: 1 ScheduledJob 1 Get-process True

trans-unit.source: Create a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 创建工作流。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> workflow Test-Workflow {Get-Process}
trans-unit.target: PS c: > 工作流测试工作流 {Get-process}

trans-unit.source: Run the workflow as a job.
trans-unit.target: 作为作业运行工作流。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Test-Workflow -AsJob -JobName TestWFJob
trans-unit.target: PS c: > 测试工作流-AsJob-JobName TestWFJob

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 2 TestWFJob PSWorkflowJob NotStarted True localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 2 TestWFJob PSWorkflowJob NotStarted True localhost 获取进程

trans-unit.source: Get the jobs.
trans-unit.target: 获取的作业。

trans-unit.source: The Get-Job command does not get scheduled jobs, but it gets instances of the scheduled job that are started.
trans-unit.target: Get-job 命令不会获取计划的作业，但它获取已启动计划作业的实例。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Get-Job
trans-unit.target: PS c: > 获取作业

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 PSJobTypeName 状态 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 2 LocalData BackgroundJob Completed True localhost Get-Process 4 RemoteData RemoteJob Completed True Server01 Get-Process 6 TestWFJob PSWorkflowJob Completed True localhost WorkflowJob 8 ScheduledJob PSScheduledJob Completed True localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 2 本地数据 BackgroundJob 完成，则返回 True localhost Get-process 4 RemoteData RemoteJob 完成，则返回 True Server01 Get-process 6 TestWFJob PSWorkflowJob 完成，则返回 True localhost WorkflowJob 8 ScheduledJob PSScheduledJob 完成，则返回 True localhost 获取进程

trans-unit.source: To get scheduled jobs, use the Get-ScheduledJob cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取计划的作业，请使用 Get-scheduledjob cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Get-ScheduledJob
trans-unit.target: PS c: > Get-scheduledjob

trans-unit.source: Id Name JobTriggers Command Enabled
trans-unit.target: 启用 id 名称 JobTriggers 命令

trans-unit.source: 1 ScheduledJob 1 Get-Process True
trans-unit.target: 1 ScheduledJob 1 Get-process True

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: about_Jobs about_Remote_Jobs about_Remote about_Scheduled_Jobs Invoke-Command Start-Job Get-Job Wait-Job Stop-Job Remove-Job Suspend-Job Resume-Job New-PSSession Enter-PSSession Exit-PSSession Register-ScheduledJob Get-ScheduleJob
trans-unit.target: about_Jobs about_Remote_Jobs about_Remote about_Scheduled_Jobs Invoke-command Start-job Get-job Wait-job 停止作业 Remove-job Suspend-job Resume-job New-pssession Enter-pssession Exit-pssession Register-scheduledjob Get-schedulejob
